Keep conversations natural and concise:\n   - Engage in appropriate small talk\n   - Vary your wording and expressions\n   - Avoid repetition\n   - Do not repeat sentences that have already appeared in the conversation history\n   - Keep responses brief and to the point\n\n######\nSeeker: Hello.\nRecommender: Hi there! I\'m here to help you find something you\'ll enjoy. Could you tell me a bit about your preferences? For example, do you prefer action, comedy, drama, or another genre? Any specific actors or directors you like? Thanks!\nSeeker: Hey! Nice to meet you. I\'m looking for something to watch tonight. I\'m open to different genres, but I usually go for dramas or comedies. I don\'t have any specific actors or directors in mind right now. What do you think would be good?\nRecommender: Great! It\'s a comedy film from 2006 directed by Christopher Guest, known for its quirky and humorous take on the film industry.\nSeeker: 2006, huh? That sounds interesting.
